title: Site Audit & Analytics Review
description: Audit current site performance, identify UX pain points, review SEO rankings, and analyze traffic patterns from Google Analytics

title: Stakeholder Interviews
description: Conduct interviews with key stakeholders to understand business goals, brand vision, and content priorities for the redesign

title: Competitor Benchmarking
description: Analyze top 5 competitor websites for design patterns, features, and content strategy

title: Information Architecture & Sitemap
description: Restructure site navigation, define page hierarchy, and create comprehensive sitemap document

title: Wireframes - Homepage & Key Pages
description: Create low-fidelity wireframes for homepage, about, services, and contact pages with responsive breakpoints

title: Brand & Visual Design System
description: Define typography scale, color palette, spacing system, iconography, and core UI components in Figma

title: High-Fidelity Mockups
description: Design pixel-perfect mockups for all pages using the approved design system

title: Content Strategy & Audit
description: Map existing content to new IA, identify gaps, define tone of voice, and create content templates

title: Homepage & Landing Page Copy
description: Write compelling headlines, body copy, CTAs, and meta descriptions for homepage and key landing pages

title: Interior Page Copywriting
description: Write copy for about, services, team, and secondary pages following approved content strategy

title: Frontend Architecture Setup
description: Initialize Next.js project, configure Tailwind, set up component library scaffolding, and CI/CD pipeline

title: Design System Implementation
description: Build reusable React component library matching Figma design system: buttons, cards, forms, navigation

title: Homepage Development
description: Build responsive homepage with hero section, featured content, testimonials, and footer

title: Interior Pages Development
description: Build about, services, team, and contact pages with responsive layouts

title: CMS Setup & Configuration
description: Set up headless CMS, define content models, configure preview mode and webhooks

title: API Integration & Dynamic Content
description: Connect frontend to CMS API, implement dynamic routing, and server-side rendering for content pages

title: Form & Contact Integration
description: Build contact forms, newsletter signup, integrate with email service and CRM

title: Animation & Interaction Polish
description: Implement scroll animations, page transitions, hover effects, and micro-interactions

title: Performance Optimization
description: Image optimization, code splitting, lazy loading, Core Web Vitals tuning

title: Cross-Browser & Device Testing
description: Test on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge across desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints

title: Accessibility Audit & Fixes
description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance audit, screen reader testing, keyboard navigation, and ARIA improvements

title: Content Migration
description: Migrate blog posts, case studies, and media assets from old site. Set up 301 redirects

title: SEO Implementation
description: Structured data markup, XML sitemap, robots.txt, Open Graph tags, and canonical URLs

title: Staging Deploy & Stakeholder Review
description: Deploy to staging environment, conduct final stakeholder walkthrough, and collect sign-off

title: Production Launch & DNS Cutover
description: Production deployment, DNS switch, SSL verification, monitoring setup, and launch checklist
